about_the_game:
PSIONIC is an intense and atmospheric 2D shooter that thrusts players into the heart of a nightmarish psychiatric hospital. As the only surviving scientist trapped within its sinister walls, you must navigate through twisted corridors and blood-soaked rooms, battling against hordes of mutated creatures driven by a murderous frenzy. In this harrowing survival horror experience, your primary goal is to escape the asylum and uncover the truth behind the catastrophic experiment that unleashed this madness. To survive, you'll need to scavenge the environment for crucial resources such as ammunition, medical kits, and weaponry, ranging from conventional firearms to devastatingly powerful experimental devices.

The pixel art graphics lend a dark and gritty aesthetic to the game, immersing players in the haunting atmosphere of the asylum. Combined with chilling sound design and a haunting soundtrack, PSIONIC delivers an unforgettable and immersive experience that will keep players on the edge of their seats. The gameplay is dynamic and challenging, requiring quick reflexes, precise aiming, and strategic decision-making. Each enemy encounter presents a unique threat, with their own distinct behaviors and attack patterns. Adaptation and resource management are key to survival as you navigate treacherous environments, solve puzzles, and unravel the dark secrets of the asylum.

GAME FEATURES
  • Haunting Atmosphere: PSIONIC delivers a chilling and atmospheric experience, immersing players in the dark and twisted world of a haunted psychiatric hospital. The pixel art graphics, eerie sound design, and haunting soundtrack combine to create an unsettling ambiance.
  • Intense Survival Gameplay: The game offers a challenging survival experience, where players must navigate through dangerous environments, battle against mutated creatures, and scavenge for resources to stay alive. Quick reflexes, strategic thinking, and resource management are crucial for survival.
  • Diverse Weaponry: Players have access to a wide range of weapons, from conventional firearms to experimental devices. Each weapon offers unique advantages and playstyles, allowing players to adapt their strategy to different enemy encounters.
  • Engaging Storyline: PSIONIC features a compelling narrative that unfolds as players progress through the game. Discover the secrets of the asylum, unravel the mysteries behind the experimental madness, and uncover the truth behind your own involvement.
  • Immersive Pixel Art Visuals: The game's pixel art graphics create a visually captivating and nostalgic aesthetic. The attention to detail in the environments and character designs adds depth to the immersive experience, enhancing the overall atmosphere of the game.
